li.em: Quelque chose à déclarer Monsieur. ... Reeborg?

li.tt: Je ne parle pas français .... I do not speak French.

li.em: Do you have something to declare?

p: Reeborg is known internationnally and travels often. It might be useful to teach him words in a different language. For functions, this can be done using the Javascript keyword var. I like to think of var as creating some variation of the language, perhaps following a Very Acient Ritual. However, in programming terms, this is simply known as declaring a variable.
We can do this in either 1 or two steps.
Perhaps you could define your own language for giving instructions to Reeborg.
